name: Find The Bomb (reddave)
description:
Find the Bomb

Strategically position detectors to find bombs

How to play:
  • Drag and drop the detectors around
  • Click the detector to select it
  • Click "Power" to activate the detector
  • A number will display in the top right - this displays the number of bombs in its given zone (see "Detectors" below)
  • Right-click to place flags where you think the bomb is
  • Click "Detonate" to dispose the bombs under the flag
Detectors:

Tiny metal detector - Detects if its current square contain a bomb

Medium metal detector - Detects the number of bombs in its current or directly adjacent (horizontal or vertical) squares contain a bomb

Large metal detector - Detects the number of bombs in its current or neighbouring (adjacent and diagonal) squares

-made by reddave
